content.rendered:
Patronato

Mark H. Rosenberg, Chairman
Maria Cortez de Lobāo, Vice Chair
Sergio J. Galvis, Vice Chair
William R. Harman, Treasurer
Marlene Alva, Secretary
Regina Weingarten
James Blanco
Lori Cohen
Ambassador James Costos
José Rafael Fernández
Elizabeth Goizueta
Jonathan Hogg
Cynthia Hudson
Ana Laffont, Trustee Emerita
Francisco A. Lorenzo
Philippe de Montebello, Chairman Emeritus
Yvette Ostolaza
Emily K. Rafferty
Daniel Romualdez
Antonio del Valle, Trustee Emeritus
Bob Vila

Personal

ADMINISTRACIÓN

Guillaume Kientz, Director y CEO
Frances Cuadro, Executive Assistant to the Director & Operations Manager
Elizabeth Dowd, Director of Human Resources
Breanna Garter, Business Manager

RESTAURACIÓN

Hèléne Fontoira, Head of Conservation

PATROCINO

Cinthia Fernholz, Director of Development                                                                                     Natalia Gaiser, Manager of Individual Giving
Gabrielle Kester, Manager of Institutional Giving & Grant Writer

BIBLIOTECA

Dr. John O’Neill, Curator of Manuscripts and Rare Books
Vanessa Pintado, Assistant Curator of Rare Books & Manuscripts
Javier Milligan, Head of the Modern Library
Maria Barney, Assistant Librarian
Michelle Nani, Book Binder

MUSEO

Dr. Noemí Espinosa, Assistant Curator
Dr. Marcus B. Burke, Senior Curator of Paintings, Drawings, and Metalwork, emeritus
Dr. Priscilla Muller, Curator Emeritus
Katia Azze, Registrar
Jose Puello, Collection & Exhibition Technician

FOTOS Y GRABADOS

Dr. Patrick Lenaghan, Head of Prints and Photographs, Acting Curator of Sculpture

EVENTOS ESPECIALES Y PUBLICIDAD

Mencía Figueroa, Director of Public Relations, Programs and Special Events
Amelia Wright, PR & Special Events Associate
Alexandra Rodriguez-Jack, Assistant Editor & Graphic Designer
Brett Lazer, Manager of Digital Strategy and Marketing

EDUCACIÓN

Natalie Espino, Director of Education, Academic & Community Programs
Teresa Figueiras, Senior Educator
Ryan Pinchot, Senior Educator

OPERACIONES

Roberto Terrana, Director of Facilities
Rani Narine, Security Guard
Javaughn Pitterson, Security Guard
Jose Valdez, Maintenance
